phenotype_id.description: Unique identifier for the phenotype entry.

participant_id.description: Identifier for the participant associated with this phenotype.

term_id.description: Identifier for the term within the ontology used to describe the phenotype.

presence.description: Indicates if the phenotype is present, absent, or unknown.

ontology.description: The ontology used to classify the phenotype term.

additional_details.description: Additional details about the phenotype that are not supported/available as a term in the specified ontology.

onset_age_range.description: The age range at which the phenotype onset occurs.

additional_modifiers.description: Additional modifiers that further specify the phenotype.

syndromic.description: Indicates if the phenotype is part of a syndromic condition.
